skills.name: Zaizan of Guilt
skills.description: [SP: 4][CD: 20s] Unleash a quick forward slash to deal 700.0% ATK of Physical DMG and boost team Crit Rate by 10.0% and Crit DMG by 15.0% for 9s. Effect cannot stack, but can be refreshed by Shadow Dash's Ultimate on hit when this weapon is equipped by her.

skills.name: Fearsome Weeping
skills.description: Combo ATK and Ultimate deal 25.0% bonus Crit DMG. Upon entry or evasion skill activation, wielder takes 20.0% less Physical DMG for 9s. Can stack.
